name: Seinarukana -The Spirit of Eternity Sword 2-
description: Thrown into another world, Setoki Nozomu must fight to bring his friends home, while at the same time struggling against the ancient god that sleeps inside him. So begins a journey that will shake the very foundation of the universe. The sequel to the visual novel RPG, Aselia the Eternal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.4Ghz Single-Core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible with 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
